name: PIT BULL LOYAL "Scratch All Day" cd
description:
Hardcore and Metal-core music fans, prepare for something heavy and new. The first PBL cd, "Scratch All Day", is a 5 song EP featuring tracks: 
1)MAKTUB 
2)O'GOD, WHERE ART THOU? 
3)SCRATCH ALL DAY 
4)LAST LAUGH 
5)FOREVER AND A DAY
"Scratch All Day" also marks the return of Jerry Beck to the hardcore/metal scene after a nearly 25 year hiatus.
